Token.Abstract: The Zone Manager interface is the central point for configuring the delivery of zone-related events. You use an instance of this class to establish the parameters that determine when location and heading events should be delivered and to start and stop the actual delivery of those events. You can also use a zone manager object to retrieve the most recent location and heading data.
Invoked when the device enters a zone

Parameter.Name: zoneManager
Parameter.Abstract: The zone manager that generated the callback.

Token.Abstract: Invoked when the device exits a zone

Parameter.Name: zoneManager
Parameter.Abstract: The zone manager that generated the callback.

Token.Abstract: Invoked when one or more zones are added to the list of available zones

Parameter.Name: zoneManager
Parameter.Abstract: The zone manager that generated the callback.

Parameter.Name: zones
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the zones that were added.

Token.Abstract: Invoked when one or more zones are removed from the list of available zones

Parameter.Name: zoneManager
Parameter.Abstract: The zone manager that generated the callback.

Parameter.Name: zoneIdentifiers
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the zone identifiers of the zones that were deleted.

Token.Abstract: Invoked when one or more zones are updated in the list of available zones

Parameter.Name: zoneManager
Parameter.Abstract: The zone manager that generated the callback.

Parameter.Name: zones
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the zones that were modified.

Token.Abstract: Invoked when the a check-in operation is perfomed in a zone

Parameter.Name: zoneManager
Parameter.Abstract: The zone manager that generated the callback.

Parameter.Name: zone
Parameter.Abstract: The zone where the check-in was performed.

Token.Abstract: Invoked when the a check-in operation fails

Parameter.Name: zoneManager
Parameter.Abstract: The zone manager that generated the callback.

Parameter.Name: zone
Parameter.Abstract: The zone where the check-in failed.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error that caused the check-in to fail.
